
#include<iostream>

bool isInteger(double dNum)
{
	int num = dNum;
	return num == dNum;
}

int main()
{
	int T;
	std::cin >> T;
	while(T--)
	{
		int nValue;
		std::cin >> nValue;
		int i = 0;
		double dQuotient = 1.5;	// dummy value
		while(dQuotient > 0 && !isInteger(dQuotient))
		{
			dQuotient = ((double) (nValue - 4 * i)) / 7;
			i++;
		}
		if(dQuotient < 0)
		{
			std::cout << "-1\n";
		}
		else
		{
			std::cout << (int)(7 * dQuotient) << std::endl;
		}
	}
	return 0;
}
